item.title: New Hope Club,Danna Paola - Know Me Too Well
item.description:
I spend my weekends
tryna get you off
My mind
again
But I can’t make it
stop
I’m tryna
pretend
I’m good
but you can tell
You’re right I shoulda
texted you goodnight

more time
I wish I had’ve known
this before

our goodbye
But
